question_text: Select two roles that DMARC performs:
answer_options: Instructs receiving servers how to handle authentication failures
Requires SPF and/or DKIM to pass
correct_answer: Instructs receiving servers how to handle authentication failures
Requires SPF and/or DKIM to pass
explanation: DMARC builds on SPF and DKIM and provides policy enforcement and reporting to prevent spoofed messages from being delivered.
